name: Nishijin Pachinko Tengoku EX
overview: Nishijin Pachinko Tengoku EX is a gambling adventure game in which the player takes the role of a pachinko gambler that wants to become richer playing different gambling machines that are around the town, with the prizes that he wins in the machines he can get new furnitures for his house. The game features 3 different pachinko machines.
